channel.title: CVE Feed for Veeam -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Veeam -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-38547|2024-08-02T17:46:55.771Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: A vulnerability in Veeam ONE allows an unauthenticated user to gain information about the SQL server connection Veeam ONE uses to access its configuration database. This may lead to remote code execution on the SQL server hosting the Veeam ONE configuration database.

item.title: CVE-2023-38549|2024-08-02T17:46:56.240Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: A vulnerability in Veeam ONE allows an unprivileged user who has access to the Veeam ONE Web Client the ability to acquire the NTLM hash of the account used by the Veeam ONE Reporting Service. Note: The criticality of this vulnerability is reduced as it requires interaction by a user with the Veeam ONE Administrator role.

item.title: CVE-2023-41723|2024-08-02T19:01:35.485Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: A vulnerability in Veeam ONE allows a user with the Veeam ONE Read-Only User role to view the Dashboard Schedule. Note: The criticality of this vulnerability is reduced because the user with the Read-Only role is only able to view the schedule and cannot make changes.

item.title: CVE-2023-38548|2024-08-02T17:46:55.720Z -- veeam -- one
item.description: A vulnerability in Veeam ONE allows an unprivileged user who has access to the Veeam ONE Web Client the ability to acquire the NTLM hash of the account used by the Veeam ONE Reporting Service.

item.title: CVE-2024-22021|2024-08-01T22:35:34.706Z -- veeam -- recovery%20orchestrator
item.description: Vulnerability CVE-2024-22021 allows a Veeam Recovery Orchestrator user with a low privileged role (Plan Author) to retrieve plans from a Scope other than the one they are assigned to.

item.title: CVE-2024-22022|2024-08-01T22:35:34.824Z -- veeam -- recovery%20orchestrator
item.description: Vulnerability CVE-2024-22022 allows a Veeam Recovery Orchestrator user that has been assigned a low-privileged role to access the NTLM hash of the service account used by the Veeam Orchestrator Server Service.

item.title: CVE-2024-29849|2024-07-10T16:34:45.982Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows unauthenticated users to log in as any user to enterprise manager web interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-29850|2024-07-09T13:10:11.661Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows account takeover via NTLM relay.

item.title: CVE-2024-29852|2024-07-09T13:10:03.753Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows high-privileged users to read backup session logs.

item.title: CVE-2024-29851|2024-07-09T13:10:07.535Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows high-privileged users to steal NTLM hash of Enterprise manager service account.

item.title: CVE-2024-29849|2024-07-09T13:10:23.767Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows unauthenticated users to log in as any user to enterprise manager web interface.

item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows account takeover via NTLM relay.

item.title: CVE-2024-29852|2024-06-25T17:53:58.372Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows high-privileged users to read backup session logs.

item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows high-privileged users to steal NTLM hash of Enterprise manager service account.

item.title: CVE-2024-29849|2024-06-25T17:54:12.653Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows unauthenticated users to log in as any user to enterprise manager web interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-29212|2024-06-04T17:58:16.449Z -- veeam -- service%20provider%20console
item.description: Due to an unsafe de-serialization method used by the Veeam Service Provider Console(VSPC) server in communication between the management agent and its components, under certain conditions, it is possible to perform Remote Code Execution (RCE) on the VSPC server machine.

item.title: CVE-2024-29855|2024-06-11T13:19:56.913Z -- veeam -- recovery%20orchestrator
item.description: Hard-coded JWT secret allows authentication bypass in Veeam Recovery Orchestrator

item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows unauthenticated users to log in as any user to enterprise manager web interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-29853|2024-06-04T17:57:41.972Z -- veeam -- agent%20for%20windows
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in Veeam Agent for Microsoft Windows allows for local privilege escalation.
